title: Participating in neighborhood events with support
description: Participating in neighborhood events with support
content:
Scenario: Participating in neighborhood events with support
    Given the neighborhood is holding a summer block party
    And Jordan wants to attend and participate
    When Jordan's support worker helps coordinate attendance
    Then the personal_agent shows event details in accessible format
    And Jordan can decide whether and how long to attend
    And Jordan participates in activities at their capability level
    And neighbors engage with Jordan directly, not just support worker
    And Jordan's presence adds to the community celebration
    And Jordan accumulates care tokens for community participation
    And Jordan experiences neighborhood belonging
